summary: A metaphysical mystery about the lives of three couples in Taipei that continually intersect over a span of several weeks.
cast: Cora Miao|Li-Chun Lee|Shih-Chieh King|Pao-Ming Ku|Ming Liu|An Wang|Shao-Chun Ma|An-Shun Yu|Chia-ching Huang|Feng Kang Chu|Shan-Chun Hung|Te-Ming Lu|Chung-Hua Ni|Ming-Yang Shih|Zhiwen Xiao
title: Kong bu fen zi
